NBC Parody Art

Saturday Night Live and Late Night with Seth Meyers often feature sketches that parody pop culture. Our design team makes parody movie posters, album art, and everything in-between as a fun way to complement high-performing clips on Instagram. For SNL, we have 2-6 hours to make each piece. These are some that I made independently.
